Uses of Class
islandtrader.core.RandomEvent

Packages that use RandomEvent
Package Description
islandtrader.core  
service  

  • Uses of RandomEvent in islandtrader.core

    Subclasses of RandomEvent in islandtrader.core
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Pirate
    Represents a Pirate to be used in the RandomEvents encounters that will happen when Trader is sailing.
    class  RescuedSailor
    Represents the RandomEvent "Rescued Sailors", when the Traders have this encounters they are rewarded with a monetary amount, that will vary depending on the number of Rescued Sailors they save.
    class  UnfortunateWeather
    Represents the RandomEvent "Unfortunate Weather, this could be a Thunder storm, very Strong Winds etc and will give some random amount of damage to the Trader's Ship, the Ship may endure more if it has any upgrades to help it.

    Gets a random event that happens when sailing
